## RadioBrowserApi.getTags() method

Gets all available tags

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
getTags(tag?: string, query?: Query, fetchConfig?: RequestInit): Promise<TagResult[]>;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  tag | string | Limit results to particular tag |
|  query | [Query](./radio-browser-api.query.md) | Query |
|  fetchConfig | RequestInit | Fetch configuration |

<b>Returns:</b>

Promise&lt;[TagResult](./radio-browser-api.tagresult.md)<!-- -->\[\]&gt;

List of tag results
